statements: SELECT brand FROM vectors WHERE size = 7 and brand = "adidas" GROUP BY brand ORDER BY approx_vector_distance(vec, $qvec, 'l2_squared', 10) LIMIT 4
error: Cannot use GROUP BY clause with vector search function

statements: SELECT MIN(meta().id) FROM vectors WHERE size = 7 and brand = "adidas" ORDER BY size, brand, approx_vector_distance(vec, $qvec, 'l2_squared', 10) LIMIT 4
error: Cannot use aggregate/window functions with vector search function

statements: SELECT meta().id, rank() over() FROM vectors WHERE size = 7 and brand IN [ "adidas", "nike" ] ORDER BY size, brand, approx_vector_distance(vec, $qvec, 'l2_squared', 10) LIMIT 4
error: Cannot use aggregate/window functions with vector search function

statements: SELECT r1.id, r1.color, APPROX_VECTOR_DISTANCE(r1.vec, query_vector[0], "L2") AS distance FROM vectors AS r1 LET query_vector = ( SELECT RAW vec FROM vectors WHERE size = 7 AND brand = "adidas" LIMIT 1 ) ORDER BY distance LIMIT 5
error: Invalid parameter (query vector) specified for vector search function: query vector must be static (e.g. constant, positional/named parameter or WITH alias)

statements: SELECT r1.id, r1.color, r2.id AS id2, APPROX_VECTOR_DISTANCE(r1.vec, r2.vec, "L2") AS distance FROM vectors AS r1, vectors AS r2 WHERE r2.size = 7 AND r2.brand = "adidas" ORDER BY distance LIMIT 5
error: Invalid parameter (query vector) specified for vector search function: query vector must be static (e.g. constant, positional/named parameter or WITH alias)
